languages.text: "Несомненно, Вольный Торговец здесь, чтобы выслушать всех нас и наказать предателей". {n}Слова губернатора, обращенные к Клеменции, звучат резко. Их поддерживают презрительные насмешки и шепотки среди собравшейся знати.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Несомненно, Вольный Торговец здесь, чтобы выслушать всех нас и наказать предателей". {n}Слова губернатора, обращенные к Клеменции, звучат резко, почти грубо. Их поддерживают презрительные насмешки и шепотки среди собравшейся знати.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "The Rogue Trader is undoubtedly here to listen to the testimony of each and every one of us — and to punish the traitors." {n}The governor's words, directed at Clementia, are harsh. They are echoed by the scornful sneers and whispers of the assembled nobles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Несомненно, Вольный Торговец здесь, чтобы выслушать всех нас и наказать предателей". {n}Слова губернатора, обращенные к Клеменции, звучат резко. Их поддерживают презрительные насмешки и шепотки среди собравшейся знати.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Without a doubt, the Rogue Trader is here to hear each and every of us out and punish the traitors." {n}Governor's words, directed at Clementia, are harsh. They are supported by the scornful sneers and whispers of the nobles gathered around.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Without a doubt, the Rogue Trader is here to hear each and every of us out and punish the traitors." {n}Governor's words, directed at Clementia, are harsh. They are supported by the scornful sneers and whispers of the nobles gathered around.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Without a shred of a doubt, the Rogue Trader is here to hear each and every of us out and punish the traitors." {n}Governor's words, directed at Clementia, are harsh. They are supported by the scornful sneers and whispers of the nobles gathered around.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Without a shred of a doubt, the Rogue Trader is here to hear each and every of us out and punish the traitors." {n}Governor's words, directed at Clementia, are harsh. They are supported by the scornful sneers and whispers of the nobles gathered around.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The Rogue Trader is undoubtedly here to listen to the testimony of each and every one of us — and to punish the traitors." {n}The governor's words, directed at Clementia, are harsh. They are echoed by the scornful sneers and whispers of the assembled nobles.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "The Rogue Trader is undoubtedly here to listen to the testimony of each and every one of us — and to punish the traitors." {n}The governor's words, directed at Clementia, are harsh. They are echoed by the scornful sneers and whispers of the assembled nobles.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「自由開拓者がここにいるのは、私たち全員から各々の話を聞き、裏切り者を罰するためだ」{n}総督の言葉はクレメンティアに向けられており、辛辣だ。当事者たちは、さげすむようにあざ笑い、貴族たちのささやきが反響する。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader is undoubtedly here to listen to the testimony of each and every one of us — and to punish the traitors." {n}The governor's words, directed at Clementia, are harsh. They are echoed by the scornful sneers and whispers of the assembled nobles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者がここにいるのは、私たち全員から各々の話を聞き、裏切り者を罰するためだ」{n}総督の言葉はクレメンティアに向けられており、辛辣だ。当事者たちは、さげすむようにあざ笑い、貴族たちのささやきが反響する。{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “毫无疑问，行商浪人此行正是为了博采众议，严惩叛徒。”{n}德莱夫斯塔声色俱厉，话锋直指克莱门缇雅。周围的贵族交头接耳地发出轻蔑的嘲笑，附和着总督的发言。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader is undoubtedly here to listen to the testimony of each and every one of us — and to punish the traitors." {n}The governor's words, directed at Clementia, are harsh. They are echoed by the scornful sneers and whispers of the assembled nobles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “毫无疑问，行商浪人此行正是为了博采众议，严惩叛徒。”{n}德莱夫斯塔声色俱厉，话锋直指克莱门缇雅。周围的贵族交头接耳地发出轻蔑的嘲笑，附和着总督的发言。{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Il ne fait aucun doute que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} est ici pour entendre le témoignage de chacun d'entre nous et châtier les traîtres comme il se doit, » {n}rétorque sèchement le gouverneur en s'adressant indirectement à Clémentia. Une vague de murmures et de ricanements méprisants parcourt l'assemblée des nobles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader is undoubtedly here to listen to the testimony of each and every one of us — and to punish the traitors." {n}The governor's words, directed at Clementia, are harsh. They are echoed by the scornful sneers and whispers of the assembled nobles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Il ne fait aucun doute que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} est ici pour entendre le témoignage de chacun d'entre nous et châtier les traîtres comme il se doit, » {n}rétorque sèchement le gouverneur en s'adressant indirectement à Clémentia. Une vague de murmures et de ricanements méprisants parcourt l'assemblée des nobles.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «Está claro que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha venido para escuchar el testimonio de cada uno de los presentes y castigar a los traidores». {n}Las palabras del gobernador, dirigidas a Clementia, son duras. Las burlas y murmullos de los nobles reunidos hacen eco del sentimiento.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader is undoubtedly here to listen to the testimony of each and every one of us — and to punish the traitors." {n}The governor's words, directed at Clementia, are harsh. They are echoed by the scornful sneers and whispers of the assembled nobles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Está claro que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha venido para escuchar el testimonio de cada uno de los presentes y castigar a los traidores». {n}Las palabras del gobernador, dirigidas a Clementia, son duras. Las burlas y murmullos de los nobles reunidos hacen eco del sentimiento.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist zweifellos hier, um sich die Aussagen von jedem einzelnen von uns anzuhören ... und die Verräter hart zu bestrafen." {n}Die an Clementia gerichteten Worte des Gouverneurs sind barsch. Sie werden vom verächtlichen Gelächter und dem Flüstern der umstehenden Adligen aufgegriffen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader is undoubtedly here to listen to the testimony of each and every one of us — and to punish the traitors." {n}The governor's words, directed at Clementia, are harsh. They are echoed by the scornful sneers and whispers of the assembled nobles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist ohne jeden Zweifel hier, um jeden einzelnen von uns anzuhören und die Verräter zu bestrafen." {n}Die an Clementia gerichteten Worte des Gouverneurs sind harsch. Unterstützt werden sie noch von den verächtlichen Mienen und dem Gegrummel der umstehenden Adligen.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'in buraya ifademizi almak ve hainleri cezalandırmak için geldiği aşikâr." {n}Vali, Clementia'yı soyluların fısıltılarında yankılanan bu sözleriyle azarlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader is undoubtedly here to listen to the testimony of each and every one of us — and to punish the traitors." {n}The governor's words, directed at Clementia, are harsh. They are echoed by the scornful sneers and whispers of the assembled nobles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir'in buraya ifademizi almak ve hainleri cezalandırmak için geldiği aşikâr." {n}Vali, Clementia'yı soyluların fısıltılarında yankılanan bu sözleriyle azarlıyor.{/n}
